Content:
This is a '96 Yamaha Virago xv535 for sale a few hours from me with less than 3K miles and has been in climate-controlled storage. It seems these are fairly rare to find un-trashed. The owner says that it runs great, has no leaks, rust or issues. That remains to be seen until I SEE IT.

I've read great reviews about the bike. I'm not concerned that it's more of a starter bike, but for old me, that's okay. The bike will achieve over 90mph top speed and cruise easily at 70 or more.

Owner wants $2,900. for it. Seems reasonable. Thoughts???

Oh yeah...Happy New Year!

Title: I'm continuing my search for a bike...how about this one?
Author: Dobson Fly
